reviews.content: this company is awful they pulled this scam on me charged my prime to a wrong credit card i asked them to charge the default card instead they marked the charge disputed and cancelled my prime when i contacted them again to find out what was going on they said i had to sign up for prime again they sent a link i clicked the link i signed up for prime again at a huge price increase won t keep their word to fix the price blamed it on me guess i don t have prime anymore as they wanted

amazon is now home to the worst customer service and the worst implementation of ai i ve ever experienced their help and support is basically non existent at this point it s just their terrible ai assistant that does nothing but redirect you endlessly to pages you ve already been to i ve had issues with packages being stolen delivery drivers not following delivery instructions and other technical issues with both the app and website i might just be done buying from amazon i m serious

love amazon shopping so many categories like clothing plants food i buy a lot of my pet food via amazon and with my amazon prime subscription i save heaps with free delivery i also use subscribe save for some frequent or repeat purchases like dog treats every few months you can choose to have a repeat delivery from as often as every week all the way up to once every 6 months and you save 10 by doing so obviously i would recommend amazon shopping

amazon can be frustrating at the best of times lately i ve noticed that whenever i m connected to a different wifi router amazon doesn t open and says oops something went wrong but if i connect to my own wi fi it seems to work people are me to believe that paying for amazon prime gets you next day delivery but i can assure you that is not always the case sometimes you can wait almost a month or more for a parcel from china

recent update rendered app completely unusable i use a vpn that blocks malware and third party trackers and the like on the previous versions if i clicked on a listing that was sponsored it would not be able to complete the request which is good but on the recent update the app literally doesn t work at all without turning off vpn it is either harboring malware and or selling all of our data and embedding trackers within our devices to sell to third parties

amazon has now made it impossible for me to make purchases from the app when i try to purchase something it wants me to verify my card through the nfc reader my card does not have nfc and there is no other way to verify it on the app just terrible options that don t work for everyone no warning or anything amazon used to be my favorite online store now it just gets worse and worse in many different ways

suspiciously high positive feedback for this app it didn t ask me for the requisite permissions bluetooth location when i tried to get an amazon locker open just kept reporting uh oh something went wrong every time i cleared cache logged out and back in uninstalled and reinstalled gave it all permissions in app permissions all to no avail then i found the permissions settings in the app itself and repeated all of the previous troubleshooting steps no dice android15 pixel7pro

from the time you make a purchase and up until you actually receive the item it s constant anxiety over whether it will actually show up or not you can t spend larger amounts of money since you may not receive it and that money could be tied up for weeks before you see it again online shopping is just not worth the hassle anymore there are just too many opportunities at least with amazon for the package to be stolen or lost in shipping too many shady companies they do business with

for no reason i keep being auto signed up for prime monthly membership it s happened twice in the last few months i m not an idiot i don t ever choose try prime for 30 days or whatever it asks when making a purchase i decline it every time i see a message like this but somehow all of a sudden my account shows the prime symbol at random again amazon your about to have a lawsuit on your hands if you are doing this to more people than just me i assume you are
not a fan of the recent update ads on top then item picture and description on bottom very strange what is going on while at checkout the app has gotten slower especially with viewing the pictures

a lot of things just don t work in the app some listings i type a question in the search box click search and nothing happens i sent a seller 2 messages asking the same question they never got back to me so i tried to click report seller which shows up in the message and the button doesn t even work i also tried to submit feedback for that seller but couldn t do so without already purchasing an item from them first i would type more but ran out of characters

look i understand people make mistakes at times when delivering to an address but cmon it s happened so many times i m tired of it especially overnight deliveries where there s almost no traffic and people should pay attention to house numbers overall the app is nice and i have no issues it s just the issues of delivery at times that s it and yes i have my correct address on it

the app itself is okay but it s getting difficult to find any value in the prime subscription prices are weirdly different for identical items depending on whether i use my main paid account vs my work non subscription account the app gets glitchy often putting things in my order that were unchecked in my cart the spladh screen is annoying just wedging an ad in before i shop i feel it should be universally agreed that paid subscriptions should be free of ads

it s a good app for shopping and getting what i need fast the only real complaint i have is they removed the save for later feature and i had stuff in there i planned to buy when i had the money they say we ll just use lists but the thing is with saved for later it was visible so i could see it and if i wanted to buy it or had the money then i just moved it and got it where as list are out of sight out of mind and i ll forget all about it

website app order delivery tracking map needs 2 b separated from the order delivery details window map should open in separate page w clear full view w out blockage of addt l windows able 2 have satellite view real time tracking as often tracking is off by several blocks delivery pref s need to include back door rear of building preferences 2 aid in keeping deliveries secure out of sight esp in high crime areas able 2 text driver n app if need assistance w delivery

it s a poorly designed app with incredibly slow load times and just broken interactions usually i don t care but it has actually led me to losing money i have tried to return items just to constantly get errors and when it does successfully go through it actually changes the shipping and makes it cost extra in addition the ux is atrocious the app genuinely feels archaic and any new features are incredibly slow and janky such as the ar items or ai

main issue is lack of communication from amazon itself support staff try their best tried getting parcel sent to pickup for security but one recommended pickup locker isn t actually functioning and the other two are permanently full result impossible to send to locker whereas can be delivered in 2 days to house address

this app has been fine until the last few days where it keeps trying to switch to my account i use for my kindle it is a completely separate account that i have never logged into on this app and it shouldn t be logging in on this app even after finding the switch accounts and logging out of it i cannot get it to pull up my actual account just my kindle one that again i have never logged into on this app so it shouldn t be an issue at all

the app keeps glitching every time i look up something it will freeze up or kick me out of the app altogether i ve uninstalled the app and then reinstalled it i did a clear catch on the app but it didn t change anything i love shopping with amazon but the app has been completely useless no app no shop

for some reason they just removed the option to filter reviews by height and weight i use this feature every single time i m buying clothes on amazon if i can t try it on i want to look at the reviews of people who are my same size that is how i decide which size to get and it worked really well now that option is gone i will no longer be buying clothes from the amazon app

just reloaded the app sense it is suppose to support tablets video doesn t display you hear it play but the display is off the screen you may see a little of the cc at the top can not pull down to see or rotate to see if you don t want to see how to use a product this is okay so far i haven t found anything else sense i just loaded and opened it

amazon one of the biggest online stores ever ebay and others have been around as well what i like about amazon is its quick delivery even with all what s going on about those tariffs though the drivers never follow my instructions at least they put my package by my door if ordering from afar this is where you get the slowest times and price jumps it s unfortunate but dhl others may still have the same or higher price choose wisely

i would love when you change the country to shop in and put in a delivery postcode that it would save the settings and let me search for items rather than instantly reverting back to the county i am in i want to order things on amazon co uk and get it delivered to the uk it shouldn t be that complicated its extremely frustrating

i love the amazon shopping app amazon makes it easy to search and find what you re looking for and there are so many great options to choose from i also like the wishlist and save for later features so you can keep an eye on items you might want in the future you can also get select items overnight which is amazing and has come in handy so many times highly recommend

i love this app and amazon all around very rarely does something i buy not work right or is damaged it s very secure and trustworthy most of the time fast delivery but understandable in the winter months for some delays amazon remains my favorite shopping app i can t trust temu wish ect like i trust amazon

look amazon is amazon and it s app isn t all that different from it s website from a mobile standpoint but now they re putting ads into your notification bar they could section off deals picked for you notifs and delivery update notifs but they don t lumping these two kinds of notifications together without an option to toggle them is ignorant at best and manipulative at worst i just need quick delivery updates nothing else and i don t need an app that can t or won t do just that

amazon used to be a great place to shop now it s become overloaded with so much junk it s difficult to actually find a decent product everything is a cheap knock off of a cheap knock off reviews are sounding increasingly fake like ai wrote them so i don t trust them anymore plus delivery is steadily getting worse with packages frequently getting lost or delivered to the wrong house entirely i m not renewing again thumbs down

amazon app is really bad these days the user interface is super slow and crashes they re so bogged down by chinese rip off goods that you can t find what you re looking for even when you search for it by name i was just on the phone for like half an hour with their their customer service because i can t get the app to stop shipping to the wrong address the app is super buggy they re shipping is fast but everything else is really bad expect to be frustrated

amazon has turned into a total circus most orders arrive damaged or late if they arrive at all heaven forbid you get stuck with amazon logistics as the carrier because your order might arrive in two days or twelve days with no explanation or way to predict it it s just a total guessing game sure you should get a refund eventually but i am not trying to spend money to get refunds instead of products absolutely unaceptable all around

let s talk about dumb moves and losing a sale stop refreshing recommendations when a user goes back a page on the homepage i got about 5 great suggested products clicked into one to look at hit back and amazon shot themselves in the foot completely changed them all and i cant find a single recommendation i liked now like imagine window shopping and you go back to look in the window again and it s all changed well you didn t get that spontaneous sale from me thank you

it would be great if they could get some competent developers this app is a joke if you have a default address and a default payment setup as soon as you use another address it changes to the other address even though when you go back in it still shows the original one is default have had to uninstall and reinstall and it still happens of course you can t get a full day many for customer support none of them speak english and all they can do is read off a script

good for delivering parcels but the worst at account security system ever since i ordered the xbox gift card and it didn t work it really acted up and cause so many security problems i ve reset my password 9 times now it is ridiculous i m doing what i ve should have done a long time ago and close down my account and start a new account or just not make one so i don t have to deal with any of this nightmare

list wish list doesn t keep the order from the web site list classification deals treading etc are inaccurate useless notifications about deals or promos digital content is not allowed to buy useless if your phone number changes it sends you the confirmation code to the sms how the hell some can change the number if the code is in the other one why don t you enable sending it to the email then if you want to recover it you have to call them guest what the call is not free

edit i made the original review in 2023 just popping in to say nothing has changed in 2 years their commitment to lag and app freezes is commendable original review the app freezes so severely from anything scrolling clicking ect that it s practically unusable it freezes my whole phone literally have to use the browser amazon is such a large profiting company they can afford an app update

firstly i came to complain that without notice my save for later cart was obliterated to just my most recent items all the time i spent researching the right items wasted i am also fed up that amazon has become nothing but another version of ebay full of chinese knockoffs false advertising and fake reviews it just keeps getting worse not better if you report a dangerous product they keep it for sale anyway if you write an honest bad review they remove it on certain products

the app works ok but amazon service and deliveries keep going downhill fast packages are delayed more and more they often play a switcheroo between search and payment e g the result shows delivery next day but shipping is actually three days they don t pay their workers enough and rely too much on automation and ai prime fees keep going up and you get less and less it s also very annoying to need to leave the app to purchase a prime video or kindle book

i like the variety and easy checkout process but even paying for prime delivery is slow sometimes the tracking information shows it was delivered to someone in another state and trying to get a refund replacement is a huge pain they just sent yet another package to the other side of the country and now i don t have items i need for work nor can i afford to repurchase them

the app has definitely gotten better with the updates only feedback i have is just about amazon in general when you place an order it doesn t charge your card until it ships so i constantly have to remember to check and see if amazon charged me so i know if it s safe to spend my left over balance i wish there was a way to choose to either charge my card instantly or charge when it ships

not all good not all bad had to make several returns as i spent a lot i ve found that with clothing and shoes it s too difficult to get a good fit without trying on first they shut me off for making anymore returns i can buy as much as i want but no returns i ve won most of my appeals but it s a sure thing i ll never buy these items sight unseen again easy returns no it s an inconvenience getting to the ups store in winter especially it s not easy

i still loathe multi billionaire jeff bezos but there is no denying how convenient and efficient the service amazon provides really is super fast delivery easy shopping fast checkout all the products you could ever want to find easy return system too can take returns to a whole foods market can t say what customer service is like yet hopefully it is equally as good

now forces amazon search option into gboard greed much anything good about app is tainted by the company s greed abuse of employees and etc most glaring example in site app usability is abdominal search function especially the maddeningly inconsistent incomplete filtering options a search for a phone case w additional terms returns countless inappropriate hits and btw stop using inappropriate as if its only meaning is obscene including ones that don t even fit the model

this is for the recent update march 2025 this app is hands down the worst experience in an app i ve used if not everyday then most days they made everything not intuitive there is one button i the middle for everything making it more than one tap for things that used to be one getting to purchases and account settings is far more confusing than it used to be still no dark mode in 2025 so when i open the app at night i m blinded no matter how dim my screen is

can t access our orders for tracking anymore since the recent change i do a search for my orders and it shows me shipping suggestions i used to use the app primarily for keeping track of my orders because the web site makes it difficult to tell what s arriving on a particular day and the app used to sort them by the day expected this was easy user friendly and wonderful now it s gone i have no reason to use the app anymore i can t easily track any packages anymore

since jan 1 2025 this month amazon has turned some of my packages over to usps to finish delivery only one of these actually got delivered all the others got marked undeliverable and were returned to sender one item a space heater took 17 days to arrive while temps were below 0 after making me wait 5 to 7 days before i could cancel the order then reorder if this continues i ll have to go back to shopping the old fashioned way i m really not happy with amazon shipping these days

amazon needs to improve customer options and delivery practices the app should allow bulk editing of subscriptions including the ability to skip or delete specific products based on what i want to select each unique time this will give customers more control over their subscriptions additionally delivery drivers need better training to avoid blocking doorways with packages ensuring safe and easy access to our homes customer service can also benefit from more efficient time management

amazon s app still doesn t have night mode when using it to look for baby stuff at night it s too bright even at the lowest screen brightness setting in our phones most other apps have night mode ebay for instance this should be an easy fix by now amazon s developing ai chips but cannot add this feature on their app hmmm i don t know if jeff bezos knows about his app not having this feature yet in 2025 lol please fix this asap ty

there s a very annoying recent bug or feature where often when tapping on the normal shopping cart button the rufus ai tool pops up instead even though it already had its own dedicated button sometimes it takes 3 presses to actually get to the shopping cart making the app much less intuitive and less user friendly

it s a great gift ordering app and i love doing that but one problem is the drivers from amazon driving through backyards especially mine my backyard is messed up because it was driven through if you can back out of the driveways do it if you can t back out then just pull up in the road next to the ditch and you can walk through the grass or driveway if you want to but don t drive through grass at anyone s home that can mess up their grass and fieldlines so don t do that anymore

the options that come up for the hamburger menu are rather bluntly completely worthless please give us an option to go straight to the see all shortcut menu when we use the hamburger menu most of the time i need to see either orders or subscriptions not your other stupid menu suggestions

difficult to use can t open multiple tabs to shop for items forces you to use the app even when you go to the website to try to avoid certain aspects of it when a seller replies to a question it doesn t tell what the product is makes it difficult if he has the same question about multiple products the workaround is to just uninstall the app

terrible search algorithm the app is almost unusable i have tried and tried to use this site but as the years pass the search becomes less and less capable even 15 years ago i could still use the filters as such when i searched for an item today the display photos were massive only one item is shown on the screen now not only can i not find the correct items the wrong items take up the whole screen my eyesight has not changed nor has my ability to spell or know what i want to buy

this new update is a disaster nothing in my wishlist is in order and there s no way to filter it for most recent items search brings up items totally unrelated to the keywords not to mention that nearly all orders that have been transferred to usps disappear and get lost i live a few miles from a distribution center there s no reason to transfer them to the post office been a member for over 10 years disappointed with how things have turned out these last few years

this app used to be fine it was more convenient to use than going to the website through a browser then they added rufus having a pop up for an ai that i do not want to use forced on me is unacceptable it only gets in the way you re supposed to be able to swipe it out of the way but half the time that doesn t work if someone stepped in front of people every time they tried to look at something in a real store that store would go out of business i got rid of the app because of it

2 9 25 i can not stand the popup ai assistant thing on the bottom i cant find a away to disable it so i have deleted the app not going to use it again until they allow us to op out of the bs features i don t care what you re trying to push i ll just go on the site to order if i don t stop using them all together

i love shopping on amazon it s my main go to when ordering merchandise and products online it s much easier and more convenient plus less stressful for me tech error issues however i seem to keep having consistent tech issues within the amazon app as it tends to be very laggy and glitchy when trying to view products online suddenly the app encounters an error i ve tried restarting my phone updating the app force stopping the app etc so far nothing has worked for me please help

do you even know how to set up an app not only is it the most confusingly platform to use but trying to get help for issues you re experiencing is near impossible unless you like talking to bots that ll talk you in circles either wasting your time or frustrating you so much you don t even remember why you re there because of the 50 hoops you had to jump through to finally get someone

the app constantly crashes while i am using it and it doesn t save your place it s absolute maddening it will do this multiple times when i m using it at the same time i ve tried uninstalling it and reinstalling it clearing cache and everything it s just a garbage app

love amazon but now returns are unpredictable some returns are only free at whole foods i don t live near a whole foods and the last 3 times i actually drove to whole foods their machine was down each time so now i m paying 7 to return something when most of my other returns are free if there was a way to know that the free return option was only available on a product i never would have purchased it in the first place so irritating

being disabled amazon has become my main go to for just about everything i need from medical supplies to even groceries unfortunately the last update now causes the app to automatically close when i try to search for something after one or two scrolls the app closes and i m back to my home screen checking orders has the same problem i hope this gets resolved soon

i have this annoying issue where when i m looking at reviews for an item after getting to the bottom of the current list the application will reset visual focus when loading the next list results has been going on for weeks no fix yet qa seems to be lacking updates are probably being checked with automation which doesnt test for issues like these please fix also way too many sponsored results in product searches i have to apply a bunch of filters to get the results that are relevant

menus are lengthy and impossible to navigate the payment system is ridiculous it doesn t charge right away and the orders keep failing for no reason it s impossible to tell what s going on when there s so much conflicting information statuses for instance the payment needs revision but when i go to update verify it there s no option to overall the app needs serious work in the ux ui

yeah amazon can you not delete most of the things i add to my wishlist within one minute what s the point of even shopping on your app if it s just going to make shopping a horrible experience jeff bezos it s incredible that you managed to make amazon this much of a failure this app stresses me out so much not to mention that a majority of the time when my packages ship they get lost

what is happening to amazon i can t get most items delivered to home anymore prices change when you put item in cart less less variety offered no more free first reads requires me to pick up at whole foods which is 45min or more drive for me movies don t have in scene x ray available any more more of family friends have switched to walmart subscription think it s time to close this account i don t understand why apps are getting worse worse instead of better as time goes on

i am lowering my review to 2 stars from 3 for a few reasons a search for a specific item is useless not the item or size or color or brand i specifically searched for still no dark mode for the app added complexity confusion and complication in simply accessing orders or subscriptions useless rufus still takes up precious screen space ai generated review synopses are a waste of time and screen space overall the app keeps getting worse with each iteration

this app has always been a clunky mess the organization of menus and finding things is pretty bad i ve always managed to find what i need but now notifications just don t work since the android 15 update i have enabled every single notification option in both the app and my device settings i also recently factory reset my phone thinking that would help but it didn t c mon amazon one of the largest richest corporations and you have one of the worst app experiences

one of the worse shopping apps i have the app freezes up between loadings of their product sites customer account profile page site and anything else within the app you may need it to load i love shopping from amazon and all their products and perks they have to offer their shopping app has always had issues i am a prime member and i use the other amazon apps without any glitches it seems amazon is too big to care if the app works correctly

the app constantly tries to pitch amazon prime at me for starters which i do not want when i try to buy digital music on the app it s so hard i think it must be designed to try and make you settle for just streaming the music without buying a copy outright i cannot buy ebooks through this app and the app recently updated to insert ads in the past orders listing which has entirely broken the function in all practicality i can only recommend using the desktop version of the website instead

there is a frustrating problem with checkout i have a default address and payment method established on my account however in the past few days at checkout the defaults are not applied i have to constantly change both the payment and the shipping address on every checkout please fix this bug it leaves a bad used experience

cannot turn off email spam cannot change parental settings support is usless this app is becoming more trouble than its worth one time passwords and signatures required for any item that is even slightly expensive sometimes you cannot even get the package because the delivery people won t knock on your door to let you know they re there no option to opt out of password requirements or signatures looks like amazon without knowing it is bringing back local shopping

what happened in this update everything is out of order and rearranged in a bad way who thought it was a good idea to hide browsing history behind settings instead of leaving it where it once was and instead replacing it with keep shopping for i assume this was a buisness desicion to drive more sales instead of letting their users look at exactly what they were shopping for revert this downgrade

while we ve enjoyed this app for quite some time there are some ui options that are severely antiquated i would ve liked if they had a place to put this in app but unfortunately that doesn t exist i would like to suggest that when making a purchase the address and names be separate options this way for those who use the same account they won t have to add the same address twice or multiple times

edit app and service remain awful what an absolutely abysmal company trying to speak with any customer service agent is a labyrinthine experience that ended with me being transferred to amazon canada for no discernable reason usa resident after being locked out of my account despite multi factor authentications and with no way to approve or refute the lockdown even that would be understandable if it was at all possible to speak with a cs agent in any way yikes

going downhill fast i can t rely on amazon to send me new unused products i keep getting products that have been used and returned they don t even make an effort to check the items or make sure all the pieces are included if i pay for a new item it should be new unused and all pieces should be included i m tired of sending items back for refund or replacement

amazon special offers are technically a scam most of the products i m interested in changed it s price in less than one day so the platform is pushing the customers to subscribe to prime to pay a normal price for the items a dvd player that it was at 69 99 the next day it is at 89 99 or 99 99 and the same thing with many other items i prefer ebay even if i pay additional for shipping at least the stuffs are shipped faster

please please please add an option in your shopping cart for lists it feels really unorganized when you add stuff into your shopping cart and i feel like maybe it would be much more easier for the user when shopping like for example one list for i guess house supplies which has its own private list of items kind of like pinterest or spotify when you make your own lists and you re able to organize what you want into each category instead of jumbling it all into one big list

i can see my return that they failed to process but can t do anything with that if i click on status it tells me nothing of use and i can t contact customer support because it won t show that item on my order list since it was a gift trash app and customer service from a huge and massively profitable company i searched for a customer service phone number in the app with no result

love the convenience usually quick deliveries but not always the ease of returns to local establishments is really great reoccurring orders are a nice feature i do find the costs of some items are much higher than super market prices for example cat litter also coffee is never fresh tasting so i avoid that product another issue is trying to find the customer service number it appears that they purposely make it very difficult to find on the site

leaving review for amazon shopping in general it s become tedious searching for items trying to find replacement headsets has been crazy need usb wired with inline mute button and controls purchased 6 before i finally got a set that worked all specs seemed to match and rufus is a joke finally found searching other merchants and purchased on amazon i ve never had to return so many items as this week and forget about customer reviews if they even apply to the product

unbearable lag in review image gallery i ve been an android user for many years and this problem has never been fixed when viewing customer review photos swiping between pictures causes constant lag stutters and freezing the app feels unresponsive and clunky compared to ios it s extremely frustrating especially when trying to see product details before buying please address this issue it s been neglected for way too long

the latest app update has a new feature that breaks its usefulness no longer do you get needed notifications about shipments you get told your item has shipped or item has arrived it used to tell you exactly what item was shipped or arrived and when you are browsing amazon itself the browse mode is pretry useless with a very limited look of what is offered maybe 100 items tops nowhere within the app is an option to leave feedback about the app and the customer service pathway bad

amazon is so full of bad products it s become almost impossible to use unless i have an exact brand to look for which will also be hard to find if it s not super popular or sponsored i m returning about 9 10 products for misleading images and or horrible quality such a waste of time plus packages almost never arrive on time and i live within an hour of a giant warehouse canceling membership because it serves literally no purpose except taking my money

lately the tracking and shipping of my packages has been awful my items are constantly getting delayed and sometimes it will say an item was delivered when it wasn t i have to jump through 70 million hoops just to contact the seller it seems at times i don t really see the point in paying for premium anymore because nothing shows up on time and i feel like i m getting second rate service premium is a scam

04 06 2025 they fixed the update last year and now its happened again almost 2 weeks since i could open the app disappointing considering that even at the best of times it seems to work like a train with square wheels it moves but clunky as hell 12 03 2024 can t even open the app since the last update it crashes before it even gets past the loading screen website works app does not

i changed my sim card the app was gone i tried signing in but it won t let me tried creating new account with different email but was denied tried resetting password but asks for an old phone number that i cannot remember ugh also my large orders charge my card separately for each item creating more service charges in my account frustrated with amazon going to shop elsewhere

1 more than half the products in my search results are ads 2 the app sends me 5 notifications a day about things it wants me to buy but can t properly send me notifications about delivery updates 3 there s no way to navigate to the manage monthly payment plans page through the app you have to google it which then takes you to the app amazon will never fail to make their users suffer in exchange for fast shipping

i hate talking to an ai when there are problems with an order they do not understand what is going on or how to help i liked it better when you could talk to a real person i needed parts for my car braking system i followed their instructions on how to get the right parts and you still got it wrong ai can t fix this need to change my email or password that is a joke two factor authentication is a pain i miss real customer service i miss talking to americans not to bots

i know i m yelling at the clouds but the sponsored listing in searches are making the app useless a couple years ago you could search for a general idea of something you want and the results would bring you a great list of products to look at today unless you know exactly what you want a search just brings you a mixture of keyword indexed advertisements that are usually only distantly related to what you are looking for prime is still a good service but the app is falling off a cliff

when i logged out from the app on my phone i wasn t able to log back in getting wrong password all the time though on laptop everything works i tried to logout and log back in several times all works all also works on phone browser no success only on the phone app cleared cache and data no success also password autofill not working although being suggested annoying

for some reason amazon made the app worst the ui is pushing their assistant or ai that s not the reason for the star though they just made it problematic and harder to navigate with the recent updates they moved menus the top results aren t the best available they re just the sponsored stuff that s been how search results have always been but now it just seems harder to find products without knowing exactly what i want

i absolutely hate this app out of the half dozen apps i have on my phone this is the only app that freezes my phone kicks me off the internet constantly freezes while browsing doesn t allow me to tap on any of the selections when searching for items without freezing taking a million years to open whatever it is i tap on kicks the internet off and on and on and yes i keep all my apps up to date

i love shopping on amazon love being on it during my breaks free time however if they re going to make me pay for early delivery but my package gets delivered a week later they should at least give me a refund instead of taking my money like that the customer service chat just tells me to reject return the item s for a refund i want a refund on the early delivery fee not the item so if amazon could just take this into consideration i would really appreciate it thank you

once again modified to hide the most used function order tracking now three levels down when it was only two level down before and was one level down until 2021 requiring one to work even more to get past the ads also this version is notably slower especially when retrieving order status the changes in 2021 accelerated my shift to buying more from walmart that shift will continue
